call-to-action.delete_modal_heading: Are you sure you want to delete this call-to-action?

content-block.delete_modal_heading: Are you sure you want to delete this content block?

entitlement.user_select_placeholder: Select a User or Reading Group
entitlement.expiration_instructions: Enter YYYY/MM/DD or a human-readable string, e.g. 'in one year'

export_target.delete_modal_heading: Are you sure you want to delete this export target?

feature.delete_modal_heading: Are you sure you want to delete this feature?
feature.delete_confim_body: And we're sorry to see it go.
feature.new_instructions: Complete the form below to make a new feature. Press save to continue.
feature.published_instructions: Only published features will appear on the home page.
feature.body_placeholder: A couple sentences about the feature
feature.sign_up_instructions: If enabled, a sign up button will be displayed over the feature for unauthenticated users.
feature.foreground_image_instructions: An image to display in the foreground

maker.delete_modal_heading: Are you sure you want to delete this maker?
maker.title: Title

page.external_instructions: The absolute URL for the page
page.slug_instructions: The page URL is based on the slug.
page.delete_modal_heading: Are you sure you want to delete this page?
page.delete_confim_body: And we're sorry to see it go.
page.new_instructions: Enter the name of your page and, optionally, a slug. Press save to continue.
page.unauthorized_create: You are not allowed to create pages.
page.unauthorized_update: You are not allowed to update pages.
page.body_instructions: You may use basic markdown in this field to format your content.
page.navigation_instructions: If set, this title will be used in header and footer navigation.
page.states_instructions: Manage visibility and whether or not the page appears in navigation

permissions.author: Is a project author?
permissions.delete_modal_heading: Are you sure you want to remove all permissions from this user?

user.delete_modal_heading: Are you sure you want delete this user?
user.unsubscribe_modal_message: This user will be unsubscribed from all Manifold email notifications.
user.password_modal_heading: How would you like to reset the user's password?
user.password_modal_message: Automatically send the user a new password or set one yourself.

category.title_placeholder: What would you like to call this category?

resource.default_title_message: If blank, the block title will default to "$t(backend.layout.resources_block_title)"
resource.collections_switch_info: If set, all resource collections will be included in the block. Otherwise, only featured selections will be shown.

text_create.drawer_instructions: Create a new Manifold text in the current project. Once the text is created you can add content by managing the text's sections and assets.
text_create.sections_instructions: Add and order section titles to create sections with the new text. Sections can also be added, edited, and removed later.

text_section.start_tooltip_content: Set the initial starting point for this text when viewed in the Manifold reader.
text_section.delete_confirm_heading: Are you sure you want to delete this section?

text_toc.section_link_instructions: A TOC entry must link to one of the text's sections.
text_toc.anchor_link_instructions: If set, the TOC entry will link to the anchor rather than the start of the section.

ingestion.instructions: Manifold can ingest texts from single files or a .zip collection. See the <1>documentation</1> for supported file types and directory structure.
ingestion.url_instructions: Manifold can also ingest texts by entering a URL to a Google Doc, EPUB, or HTML file.

issue.subtitle: Subtitle
issue.project_instructions: Issue content is stored in projects. Select an existing content or leave blank to create a new project.

project_collection.short_description_instructions: If set, will display in collection summaries in place of description.
project_collection.homepage_visible_instructions: If dates set, project collection will automatically appear on homepage during specified time period.
project_collection.projects_shown_instructions: Number of projects shown in homepage blade (0 - 40).  Will show all if none is set.
project_collection.social_title_placeholder: Optionally, Enter a Social Card Title
project_collection.social_description_placeholder: Optionally, Enter a Social Card Description
project_collection.collection_icon_instructions: Select an icon for the project collection.
project_collection.collection_kind_instructions: Select a collection kind between smart or manual.
project_collection.number_projects_instructions: Number of projects included in this Collection.
project_collection.featured_projects_instructions: Include only featured projects in this Collection.
project_collection.order_manually_instructions: Click and drag projects to rearrange them.

project.color_change_message: Changing this will remove the {{label}}'s current avatar image

resource.default_title_message: If blank, the block title will default to "$t(backend.layout.resources_block_title)"
resource.collections_switch_info: If set, all resource collections will be included in the block. Otherwise, only featured selections will be shown.
resource.video_id_instructions: The video's ID is located after "?v=" in YouTube URLs, and after "vimeo.com/" in Vimeo URLs.
resource.video_source: Is this an externally linked video?

forms.title: Title
forms.description_instructions: Enter a brief description of your {{entity}}. This field accepts basic Markdown.
forms.image_instructions: Images will be resized to 1280x800 and cropped along the bottom edge.
forms.logo_instructions: If a logo is set for the {{entity}}, it will appear vertically and horizontally centered over the hero.
forms.background_color_instructions: Enter a color in one of the following formats: CSS color keyword, hexadecimal, rgb, rgba, hsl, hsla, or hwb. Leave blank to restore default background color.
forms.image_credits_instructions: Enter image credits for hero and cover. This field accepts basic Markdown.
forms.cover_image_instructions: If a cover is set for the {{entity}}, it will appear over the hero, to the right of the description.

messages.cannot_move_up: Cannot move up. Text is already in the first category.
messages.cannot_move_down: Cannot move down. Text is already in the last category.
messages.empty_category: No texts have been added to this category
messages.no_tweets: No tweets have been fetched yet.

analytics.total_stars: Total number of times project has been starred.
analytics.average_projects_starred: Average number of $t(glossary.project_other) your users have starred.
analytics.return_visit_count: {{returnVisitorCount}} of {{totalVisitorCount}} were making a return visit.
analytics.installation_activity: Your Manifold installationâ€™s content and user activity.
analytics.invalid_start_date: The start date must come before the selected end date. Updating the start date to {{date}}.
analytics.invalid_end_date: The end date must come after the selected start date. Updating the end date to {{date}}.

dashboard.empty_message_creator: This Manifold Library is empty. Click the button above to create your first project.

preview.unauthorized_create: You are not allowed to create features.
preview.unauthorized_update: You are not allowed to update features.
preview.instructions: This is an approximate preview of your feature. Foreground, background, and markdown will not be displayed until the feature is saved.

ingestion.id_placeholder: This ingestion will create a new text.

error.heading: Fatal Ingestion Error
error.body_cable:
The client application is unable to connect to the server's websocket. Please ensure that Manifold's "cable" service is available at the following location:

{{cable}}
error.body_no_cable: The CABLE_URL environment variable has not been set correctly. Please contact the administrator of this Manifold instance to correct this.
error.body_closing: After the problem has been corrected, this ingestion can be resumed at the current URL.

layout.confirm_delete_block: Are you sure you want to delete this content block?
layout.customize_blocks_message: Customize the rest of the content on your project page. Add, delete, and reorder content blocks, edit settings, and toggle visibility.
layout.description_and_images_description: Description Text, Cover Art, and Background Image
layout.hero_block_instructions: The Hero Block is the top of your {{entity}} page. Customize its content, layout, and settings here.
layout.calls_to_action_description: Buttons and links to related resources
layout.social_links_description: Links to social platforms and hashtag

permissions.instructions: Use permissions to specify which users may modify this project in the backend, and the extent to which they can modify it.

records.unauthorized: You are not allowed to manage records.

entitlements.instructions: Entitlements give users and/or reading groups access to this project. In Manifold, all projects are open by default. Configure access restrictions, below, and enable restrictions to limit access to your project.

project_collection.manage_collection_instructions: Please select a Project Collection from the list to edit its content and settings.
project_collection.create_collection_instructions: Select a Collection to edit its settings, visibility, and contents.

backend.drag_handle_instructions: Press space bar to start a drag. When dragging you can use the arrow keys to move the item around and escape to cancel. Some screen readers may require you to be in focus mode or to use your pass through key.
